about_the_game:
“Standing pictures is strange! The story is also strange! Novel game where you can enjoy chaos!!”

Description of this work

Welcome to the world of novel game where you can enjoy chaos!
This game is a short story that is `easy`, `approachable`, and `for beginners to chaotic world`, aimed at those who are visiting this chaotic world for the first time.
Play time is about 2 hours. It has multiple endings.

Story

After the summer vacation of my third year of high school, my classmate 'Kirari Habataki' called out to me.
The `Kotoha Osaka' sitting next to me was wearing strange accessories.
And the homeroom teacher, who looks like a useless adult, says, `Komomo Mizukibashi.`

All the characters are in strange poses, but that's normal for this game. A school romance novel game set in a strange world.

Features

  • Standing pictures with strange poses are very Kawaii!
  • Players are free to choose any of the frequently appearing options! All route branching points are indicated in-game, and there is no game over. You can concentrate on communicating with the heroine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
